title: The Mule
description: Earl Stone, a man in his eighties, is broke, alone, and facing foreclosure of his business when he is offered a job that simply requires him to drive. Easy enough, but, unbeknownst to Earl, he's just signed on as a drug courier for a Mexican cartel. He does so well that his cargo increases exponentially, and Earl hit the radar of hard-charging DEA agent Colin Bates.

reviews.text: You know this is a typical Clint Eastwood movie, with a lot of human drama. What I didn't understand was, that the DEA had such an effort only to catch the driver (?!). This doesnt' make sense in any way if you catch only a 90 years old driver instead of the whole cartel. wtf
